sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Rules = () => { const rulesCategories = [ { title: "Admission Rules", description: "Guidelines and procedures for student admission to Genesis School", link: "/rules/admission", icon: "📝" }, { title: "Bus Rules", description: "Transportation guidelines and safety protocols for school bus services", link: "/rules/bus", icon: "🚌" }, { title: "Fees Rules", description: "Fee structure, payment schedules, and financial policies", link: "/rules/fees", icon: "💰" }, { title: "Recommendation to Parents", description: "Guidelines and suggestions for parents to support their child's education", link: "/rules/parent-recommendations", icon: "👨‍👩‍👧‍👦" }, { title: "Rules for Discipline of Students", description: "Code of conduct and disciplinary measures for maintaining school environment", link: "/rules/discipline", icon: "⚖️" }, { title: "School Rules", description: "General rules and regulations governing school life and activities", link: "/rules/school", icon: "🏫" }, { title: "School Timings", description: "Daily schedule, class timings, and academic calendar information", link: "/rules/timings", icon: "⏰" }, { title: "School Uniform", description: "Uniform guidelines, dress code, and appearance standards", link: "/rules/uniform", icon: "👔" }, { title: "Service Rules For Teachers", description: "Professional conduct and service guidelines for teaching staff", link: "/rules/teacher-service", icon: "👩‍🏫" }, { title: "Vacation Rules", description: "Holiday schedule, vacation policies, and academic calendar", link: "/rules/vacation", icon: "🏖️" } ]; return (

Rules & Regulations

Comprehensive guidelines and policies that govern our school community, ensuring a safe, disciplined, and conducive learning environment for all.

{rulesCategories.map((rule, index) => (
{rule.icon}
{rule.title}

{rule.description}

View Details ))} {/* General Information */}

Important Notice

General Guidelines
• All rules are subject to periodic review and updates • Parents and students are expected to familiarize themselves with all applicable rules • Violation of rules may result in appropriate disciplinary action • For clarifications, contact the school administration
Contact Information

Principal Office: 7895236185

Administration: admin@genesisschool.com

Student Affairs: students@genesisschool.com

Office Hours: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM (Mon-Fri)

 ); }; export default Rules;
